schemes.name: Irrigation Pump Set Energisation Subsidy
schemes.department: Energy Department & Department of Agriculture, Government of Karnataka
schemes.description: Provides financial support for energisation of irrigation pump sets and borewells, including power connection, transformer and wiring works.
schemes.benefits: Reduces cost burden for farmers in establishing powered irrigation facilities.
schemes.eligibility: Farmers with sanctioned borewell or dugwell under notified subsidy categories.
schemes.how_to_apply: Apply through Electricity Supply Company (ESCOM) offices or Raitha Samparka Kendra.

schemes.name: Solar Powered Irrigation Pump Subsidy
schemes.description: Provides subsidy assistance for installation of off-grid and grid-connected solar irrigation pump sets.
schemes.benefits: Reduces dependence on diesel and grid electricity for irrigation.
schemes.eligibility: Priority to unirrigated, remote or power-deficit agricultural regions.
schemes.how_to_apply: Apply through KREDL or District Agriculture Office.

schemes.name: Replacement of Inefficient Irrigation Pump Sets
schemes.description: Provides financial assistance to replace old or energy-inefficient pump sets with high-efficiency motors.
schemes.benefits: Reduces electricity consumption and improves irrigation efficiency.
schemes.eligibility: Registered farmers with existing grid-connected pump sets.
schemes.how_to_apply: Apply through ESCOM offices or Agriculture Department.

schemes.name: Lift Irrigation & Borewell Motor Support Scheme
schemes.department: Department of Agriculture, Government of Karnataka
schemes.description: Provides subsidy assistance for installation of electric motors, pipelines and pump sets for lift irrigation projects.
schemes.benefits: Improves water availability for crops in elevated or water-scarce regions.
schemes.eligibility: Farmers with suitable irrigation source or community-based lift irrigation clusters.
schemes.how_to_apply: Apply through Raitha Samparka Kendra or Taluk Agriculture Office.

schemes.name: Solar Water Pumping for Dairy & Livestock Farms
schemes.description: Provides subsidy assistance for solar-powered water pumping units for dairy and livestock farms.
schemes.benefits: Ensures reliable water supply for cattle and fodder cultivation.
schemes.eligibility: Registered dairy farmers, milk producer cooperatives and livestock farmers.
schemes.how_to_apply: Apply through Department of Animal Husbandry or KREDL.
